author: Staff Reporter
text:
Members of the district Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) paid floral tributes to the portrait of Netaji Subhas Chandra Bose on his 119t{+h}birth anniversary here on Saturday.

Led by the Party’s district president Annadurai, general secretary R.P. Gopinath and other senior leaders, members recalled the contributions of Netaji to the freedom struggle of the country. They also applauded the efforts of Prime Minister Narendra Modi for releasing the digital copies of 100 files related to Netaji. They said that by releasing the digital copies, people would be able to know the mystery behind his death and also his contributions to the country’s independence. Likewise, the birth anniversary was celebrated at many places across the district by the public and various organisations.

Members of BJP recalled the contributions of Netaji during freedom struggle
title: Floral tributes paid to Netaji
